languages.text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).

languages.text:
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低15点。
装备者可以在只有125点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}的情况下使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}（不再是175点），{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}的士气阈值也会提高50点（最多提高至100点）。
如果装备者尚未拥有信念{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者，则视为已拥有此信念。
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

traits.locale_text:
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低15点。
装备者可以在只有125点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}的情况下使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}（不再是175点），可以在拥有75点士气的情况下使用{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}（不再是25点）。
如果装备者尚未拥有信念：异端主义——拥护者，则视为已拥有此信念。

装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低15点。
装备者可以在只有125点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}的情况下使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}（不再是175点），{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}的士气阈值也会提高50点（最多提高至100点）。
如果装备者尚未拥有信念{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者，则视为已拥有此信念。

languages.text:
Сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 15.
Персонаж может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} (вместо 175) и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g} при значении моментума на 50 выше (до 100).
Считается, что персонаж обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник, даже если это не так.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

traits.locale_text:
Сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 15.
Персонаж может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} (вместо 175) и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g} при 75 моментума (вместо 25).
Считается, что персонаж обладает убеждением Скверна — сторонник, даже если это не так.

Сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 15.
Персонаж может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} (вместо 175) и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g} при 75 моментума (вместо 25).
Считается, что персонаж обладает убеждением Скверна — сторонник, даже если это не так.

languages.text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が-15減少する。
使用者は、消費する {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が175ではなく125で{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用することができ、50以上の推進力で{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を使用できる（推進力の上限は100）。
使用者にまだ{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 門下生がいない場合でも、いるものとみなされる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

traits.locale_text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が15減る。
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を175ではなく、125使用して{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行い、推進力を25ではなく、75使用して{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を使う。
使用者が所有していない場合は、異端者 ― 門下生を有していると見なされる。

使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が15減少する。
使用者は、消費する{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が175ではなく125で{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用できて、50以上の推進力で{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を使用できる（推進力の上限は100）。
使用者にまだ{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 門下生がいない場合、いるものとみなされる。

languages.text:
El portador pierde −15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.
El portador puede usar {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} con 125 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} en vez de con 175 y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g} con 50 de ímpetu más (límite de 100 de ímpetu).
Se considera que el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario, aunque todavía no tenga dicha cualidad.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

traits.locale_text:
El portador pierde −15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.
El portador puede usar {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} con 125 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} en vez de con 175 y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g} con 75 de ímpetu en vez de 25.
El portador se considera Hereticus: Partidario, si todavía no tiene dicha cualidad.

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Trägers werden um −15 verringert.
Der Träger kann {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} mit 125 anstatt 175 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} sowie {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} mit +50 Dynamik (auf 100 Dynamik begrenzt) nutzen.
Der Träger wird behandelt, als hätte er {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} — Anhänger, wenn dies nicht bereits der Fall ist.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).

traits.locale_text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Trägers werden um -15 verringert.
Der Träger kann {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} mit 125 anstatt 175 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} sowie {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} mit 75 anstatt 25 Dynamik nutzen
Der Träger wird behandelt, als hätte er Haereticus – Anhänger, wenn dies nicht bereits der Fall ist.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'utilisateur sont réduites de 15.
L'utilisateur peut avoir recours à des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} de 125 au lieu de 175, et à des {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} avec une fougue augmentée de 50 (jusqu'à un maximum de 100).
On considère que l'utilisateur possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan, même si ce n'est pas encore le cas.
languages.original_text:

The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

On considère que l'utilisateur possède Hereticus — Partisan, même si ce n'est pas encore le cas.

L'utilisateur peut avoir recours à des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} avec une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} de 125 au lieu de 175, et à des {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} avec une valeur de fougue de 75 au lieu de 25.
On considère que l'utilisateur possède Hereticus — Partisan, même si ce n'est pas encore le cas.

languages.text:
Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} nitelikleri 15'er puan azalır.
Takan kişi; {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemleri{/g} 175 yerine 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumda{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemleri{/g} ise +50 daha yüksek momentumda (tavan değeri 100 momentum) kullanabilir.
Takan kişi, henüz olmasa bile {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahip kabul edilir.
languages.original_text:
